title: The Bills Are Due
description:
Mina and Domonique Foxworth pick their most intriguing offenses and defenses heading into the season. What can we really expect from the Chiefs offense without Tyreek Hill? Plus, Mina and Domonique preview the 2022 Opener: Bills vs Rams. What are the question marks for each team leading up to the official start of the season, and is it finally the Bills’ year?
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
